Intervention: Adriamycin 60 mg/m^2 iv plus Cytoxan 600 mg/m^2 iv repeat every 3 weeks for 4 cycles followed by Taxotere 100 mg/m^2; repeat every 3 weeks for 4 cycles

Adriamycin 60 mg/m^2 iv plus Cytoxan 600 mg/m^2 iv repeat every 3 weeks for 4 cycles followed by Xeloda 825 mg/m^2 po (bid) [total daily dose is 1650 mg/m^2] Days 1-14 every 3 weeks for 4 cycles plus Taxotere 75 mg/m^2 iv every 3 weeks for 4 cycles
Eligibility: previous invasive breast cancer if diagnosed >5 years before entering study;
history of severe hypersensitivity reaction to Taxotere;
previous treatment with anthracycline, anthracenedione (mitoxantrone), or taxane;
treatment with fluoropyrimidine (5-fluorouracil) within the last 5 years.
Results: Number of patients with/without recurrence of breast cancer, or death due to any cause.
Time frame: Time from the date of randomization until the date of first event, or date last known to be event free if no event was reported. Patients were followed for an average of 5 years.
Arm/Group Description: Adriamycin 60 mg/m^2 iv plus Cytoxan 600 mg/m^2 iv repeat every 3 weeks for 4 cycles followed by Taxotere 100 mg/m^2; repeat every 3 weeks for 4 cycles
Unit of Measure: participants  Patients with event: 164

Arm/Group Description: Adriamycin 60 mg/m^2 iv plus Cytoxan 600 mg/m^2 iv repeat every 3 weeks for 4 cycles followed by Xeloda 825 mg/m^2 po (bid) [total daily dose is 1650 mg/m^2] Days 1-14 every 3 weeks for 4 cycles plus Taxotere 75 mg/m^2 iv every 3 weeks for 4 cycles
Unit of Measure: participants  Patients with event: 140
